name: budget-pal
description: Automated daily spending limit SMS tracker with US Bank integration

scripts.api:dev: NODE_ENV=local node scripts/sync-prisma-env.mjs && NODE_ENV=local tsx watch apps/api/server.ts
scripts.api:dev:staging: NODE_ENV=staging node scripts/sync-prisma-env.mjs && NODE_ENV=staging tsx watch apps/api/server.ts
scripts.api:start: NODE_ENV=local node scripts/sync-prisma-env.mjs && NODE_ENV=local tsx apps/api/server.ts
scripts.api:start:staging: NODE_ENV=staging node scripts/sync-prisma-env.mjs && NODE_ENV=staging tsx apps/api/server.ts
scripts.api:start:production: NODE_ENV=production node scripts/sync-prisma-env.mjs && NODE_ENV=production tsx apps/api/server.ts
scripts.db:studio: NODE_ENV=local node scripts/sync-prisma-env.mjs && npx prisma studio --schema=apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:studio:staging: NODE_ENV=staging node scripts/sync-prisma-env.mjs && npx prisma studio --schema=apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate: NODE_ENV=local node scripts/sync-prisma-env.mjs && npx prisma migrate dev --schema=apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:staging: NODE_ENV=staging node scripts/sync-prisma-env.mjs && npx prisma migrate dev --schema=apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:status: NODE_ENV=local node scripts/sync-prisma-env.mjs && npx prisma migrate status --schema=apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:status:staging: NODE_ENV=staging node scripts/sync-prisma-env.mjs && npx prisma migrate status --schema=apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:generate: NODE_ENV=local node scripts/sync-prisma-env.mjs && npx prisma generate --schema=apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset: NODE_ENV=local node scripts/sync-prisma-env.mjs && npx prisma migrate reset --schema=apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:seed:clearAndSeed: NODE_ENV=local node scripts/sync-prisma-env.mjs && tsx apps/api/prisma/seed.ts --clear && tsx apps/api/prisma/seed.ts
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=local concurrently "npm run api:dev" "npm run scheduler:dev"
scripts.dev:staging: NODE_ENV=staging concurrently "npm run api:dev:staging" "npm run scheduler:dev:staging"
scripts.dev:all: NODE_ENV=local concurrently "npm run api:dev" "npm run web:dev"
scripts.dev:all:staging: NODE_ENV=staging concurrently "npm run api:dev:staging" "npm run web:dev"
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=local concurrently "npm run api:start" "npm run scheduler:start"
scripts.start:staging: NODE_ENV=staging concurrently "npm run api:start:staging" "npm run scheduler:start:staging"
